Class CSVReader

java.lang.Object
java.io.Reader
java.io.BufferedReader
com.group6.hms.app.screens.admin.importer.CSVReader
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AutoCloseable, Readable
Direct Known Subclasses:
MedicationStockCSVReader, PatientsCSVReader, StaffsCSVReader
public class CSVReader extends BufferedReader
The CSVReader class extends BufferedReader and provides functionality to read CSV (Comma-Separated Values) files line by line.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    scanner
    Scanner used to read lines from the input.

    • hasNext

      public boolean hasNext()
      Checks if there is another line of input to read.
      Returns:
      true if there is another line, false otherwise

    • readCSVLine

      public String[] readCSVLine()
      Reads the next line from the CSV input and splits it into an array of strings.
      Returns:
      an array of String containing the values from the CSV line
